constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 124 (Tuesday, July 26, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. MILLER of West Virginia:
H.R. 8505.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 1 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution
[Page H7171]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to permit the use of telehealth for purposes of recertification of eligibility for hospice care.
